divs: Sighting DetailsWe were in a parking lot on the pacific coast highway in Malibu. Not exactly sure what direction it went across the sky.
Summary: Appeared to be a meteor & it changed colors as it fell across the sky. Green, blue, orange.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Malibu
There were no other sightings in Malibu on or around January 18th 2009
